Uses of Class
net.casper.data.model.filters.CDataFilter

  • Packages that use CDataFilter 
    Package Description
    net.casper.data.model.filters  

    • Uses of CDataFilter in net.casper.data.model.filters

      Subclasses of CDataFilter in net.casper.data.model.filters 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DateRangeFilter 
      class  EqualsFilter
      This is the most basic type of filter.
      class  GEFilter
      This filter returns true, if the underlying data is greater than a particular lower bound
      class  LEFilter
      This filter returns true, if the data is less than a particular upper bound.
      class  RangeFilter
      A range filter will check an input value's numerical representation against upper and lower bound values.
      class  RegexFilter
      Performs a regular-expression based filtering match.
      Methods in net.casper.data.model.filters that return CDataFilter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CDataFilter[] CDataFilterClause.getAllFilters()
      Get list of all filters, including PK filter, if exists
      CDataFilter CDataFilterClause.getFilter(int idx)
      Returns appropriate filter value
      CDataFilter CDataFilterClause.getPrimaryKeyFilter()
      Return primary key equality filter

      Adds a filter to the filter chain.
